reviews.review: Muito Bom esse game
Great game.  Just started playing with a friend and the experience has been great so far.  It's a fun puzzle game that has a comical side, in which most games do not.  Very smart. :)
Jogo muito bom, divertido e com ótima jogabilidade, na minha opnião sem nenhum contra.

Franchement : trouvez-vous un pote, achetez-le ensemble, et faites la Coop ! Elle est juste géniale : les énigmes sont quantitativement satisfaisantes, et leur difficulté peut parfois... faire sauter un boulon... Mais sans mentir, ce jeu est génial.

Le solo n'est pas mal non plus. Considérons ça comme un bonus, qui sais rester drôle parfois.

Mais ! Le contenu de la communauté va permettre de faire de grandes choses !!!

Amazing game. The humorous dialog is amazingly written, and the voice acting is the best I've seen. A great story backed with awesome complex puzzles to solve. Coop is the best I've seen in any games and requires lots of communication between partners, which is lots of fun and only stregnthens relationships.

Community made content (maps mostly) and a map maker are available, giving the game almost infinite replayability. The story is very replayable too, many easter eggs are scattered around the place, giving great pleasure when finding them.

One of my favorite games all time, hope more good stuff comes from Valve. If you have not yet played the Portal series, do so.
хорошая головоломка + есть co-op на 2 игроков и + можно нарижать своих роботов,вообщем не жалейте покупайте

THIS. IS. A. GAME.

Wow, Valve really outdid themselves with this one. The story and comedy is spetacular along with the gameplay. The story and the enviroments are all executed wonderfully. Gameplay and Puzzles are WAY better than the first one. You meet the wonderful Wheatly, one of the servants in the Aperture Facility, and you try to break out of the facility. The story just keeps getting better from there. The multiplayer is a sight to be seen as well. It has just as much personality and comedy at the story! I strongly recomend Portal 2 to everyone. If it's on sale or full retail, PICK IT UP you won't regret it!
Sehr tolles Spiel

Portal 2 — игра на один раз. Зато какой! Отточив перья и логику на первой части, Valve выпустила образцовый сиквел, к которому почти не придраться. Локации масштабнее и разнообразнее, графика — техничнее, повествование — глубже. Основа основ — по-прежнему пушка, создающая два взаимосвязанных портала, правда, механика стала гораздо сложнее. Раньше мы просто дырявили поверхности, дабы миновать зону обстрела или притащить ящик в нужную точку. Теперь в уравнение добавлена целая охапка параметров. Изменений — куча, только Valve не спешит вываливать их разом. Из главы в главу дизайнеры потихоньку переписывают правила, приучая мыслить новыми категориями. Уровни рассчитаны идеально: в меру хитрые, чтобы бросить вызов и растормошить серые клеточки, но без уклона в садизм.
Was soll man noch zu einem der besten Spiele aller Zeiten sagen, außer: Wer es noch nicht gespielt hat, der sollte es so schnell wie möglich nachholen!
Super duper 15/14

Świetna kontynuacja ;) Najlepsza gra z łamigłówkami w jaką grałem. Wciągająca fabuła, dialogi przepełnione humorem, edytor w którym sami możemy tworzyć nowe pomieszczenia z zagadkami to tylko niektóre zalety tej gry. Chcesz odkryć wszystko ? Zagraj ;) Świetna produkcja dla tych którzy szukają gry do zagrania z kimś, kooperacja jest tutaj ważnym elementem, musimy komunikować się z drugim graczem i zgrać się z nim w odpowiednich momentach, działanie na ślepo nic nam nie da.

i have been addicted to this game! almost done, its my 2nd day owning it! 

>graphics:  so, the graphics are ok... until you turn up ALL THE SETTINGS ON ALL THE THINGS!! it looks great! but, graphics arent all, gameplay matters too!

>gameplay:  the gameplay... oh the gameplay, with more puzzles and puzzle elements then portal 1, it makes this game difficult, but once you complete the test chamber, your all like: how did i not think that? BRAIN WHAT DID I TEHGL U ABU BEEIN DUM?! 

>story:  its great, then all like: OMG WTF Y then its all: ohh, ok then i see how it is ;-; then its all like WAOH!! :0

overall, i think, with multiplayer included, this is like, the best game by valve. definitly worth the buy, but i got it on sale for 4.99 lol i would still reccomend this to anybody. no matter what game genre they like most..... and... its still a better love story then twilight.

Portal 2 is one of those rare games that manages to combine immersive and stunning visual environments while also implementing characters with great  sense of humor. From the very start, the game opens with a spectacular set piece that helps envelope the tone and setting of the game. Everything feels very authentic. I felt like I was actually trapped in a futuristic, experimental facility, attemtping to escape with the assistance of a comical robot named Weatly. 

The puzzles in the game also get progressively more difficult, but they are fun to figure out. The only drawback of the game, is that sometimes, for brief periods, the puzzles may seem a bit redundent, but the game manages to switch things up frequently enough to prevent you from feeling like the game is mundane or tiresome. I strongly recommend this game to both casual and hardcore gamers, I feel like most people will find something they will enjoy. Valve has once again, done a superb job. 

9.0-9.5/10
